entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
